snippet: A student in an M.B.A. class recently asked me what my five-year plan was. I wanted to answer that it was to try to make payroll next week.
abstract: A student in an M.B.A. class recently asked me what my five-year plan was. I wanted to answer that it was to try to make payroll next week.

headline.main: Reflections on the Third Anniversary of My Pink Slip
